price: 37. (Kaip bus siaubinga) kai dangus perskils pusiau ir pataps lyg rožės raudonumo alyva! [Žr. ają 70:8].
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
